str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To be courageous, confident, of good cheer. Another form for tharseo; to exercise courage.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To be at home, live in a place. From a compound of en and demos; to be in one's own country, i.e. Home.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To go abroad, be absent. From a compound of ek and demos; to emigrate, i.e. vacate or quit.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
